019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.vmconlet;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import freemarker.core.ParseException;
023import freemarker.template.MalformedTemplateNameException;
024import freemarker.template.Template;
025import freemarker.template.TemplateNotFoundException;
026import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity;
027import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity.Format;
028import java.io.IOException;
029import java.math.BigDecimal;
030import java.math.BigInteger;
031import java.time.Duration;
032import java.time.Instant;
033import java.util.HashSet;
034import java.util.Map;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.Set;
037import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
038import org.jdrupes.json.JsonBeanDecoder;
039import org.jdrupes.json.JsonDecodeException;
040import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sDynamicModel;
041import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8sObserver;
042import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.ModifyVm;
043import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmChannel;
044import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager.events.VmDefChanged;
045import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.GsonPtr;
046import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
047import org.jgrapes.core.Event;
048import org.jgrapes.core.Manager;
049import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
050import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.Conlet.RenderMode;
051import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConletBaseModel;
052import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.ConsoleConnection;
053import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletRequest;
054import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddConletType;
055import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.AddPageResources.ScriptResource;
056import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.ConsoleReady;
057import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletModel;
058import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.NotifyConletView;
059import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConlet;
060import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.RenderConletRequestBase;
061import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.events.SetLocale;
062import org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet;
063
064/**
065 * The Class VmConlet.
066 */
067@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
068public class VmConlet extends FreeMarkerConlet<VmConlet.VmsModel> {
069
070    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
071        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.View);
072    private final Map<String, K8sDynamicModel> vmInfos
073        = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
074    private final Map<String, VmChannel> vmChannels
075        = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
076    private final TimeSeries summarySeries = new TimeSeries(Duration.ofDays(1));
077    private Summary cachedSummary;
078
079    /**
080     * The periodically generated update event.
081     */
082    public static class Update extends Event<Void> {
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
087     * 
088     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
089     * on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
090     * sends the event to
091     */
092    public VmConlet(Channel componentChannel) {
093        super(componentChannel);
094        setPeriodicRefresh(Duration.ofMinutes(1), () -> new Update());
095    }
096
097    /**
098     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
099     *
100     * @param event the event
101     * @param channel the channel
102     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
103     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
104     *             exception
105     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
106     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
107     */
108    @Handler
109    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleConnection channel)
110            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
111            ParseException, IOException {
112        // Add conlet resources to page
113        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
114            .setDisplayNames(
115                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
116            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview)
117            .addScript(new ScriptResource().setScriptType("module")
118                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
119                    type(), "VmConlet-functions.js"))));
120    }
121
122    @Override
123    protected Optional<VmsModel> createNewState(AddConletRequest event,
124            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
125        return Optional.of(new VmsModel(conletId));
126    }
127
128    @Override
129    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
130    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
131            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, VmsModel conletState)
132            throws Exception {
133        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
134        boolean sendVmInfos = false;
135        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
136            Template tpl
137                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmConlet-preview.ftl.html");
138            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
139                processTemplate(event, tpl,
140                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState)))
141                        .setRenderAs(
142                            RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
143                        .setSupportedModes(MODES));
144            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
145            channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
146                conletId, "summarySeries", summarySeries.entries()));
147            var summary = evaluateSummary(false);
148            channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
149                conletId, "updateSummary", summary));
150            sendVmInfos = true;
151        }
152        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.View)) {
153            Template tpl
154                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmConlet-view.ftl.html");
155            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
156                processTemplate(event, tpl,
157                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, conletState)))
158                        .setRenderAs(
159                            RenderMode.View.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
160                        .setSupportedModes(MODES));
161            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.View);
162            sendVmInfos = true;
163        }
164        if (sendVmInfos) {
165            for (var vmInfo : vmInfos.values()) {
166                var def = JsonBeanDecoder.create(vmInfo.data().toString())
167                    .readObject();
168                channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
169                    conletId, "updateVm", def));
170            }
171        }
172
173        return renderedAs;
174    }
175
176    /**
177     * Track the VM definitions.
178     *
179     * @param event the event
180     * @param channel the channel
181     * @throws JsonDecodeException the json decode exception
182     * @throws IOException 
183     */
184    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
185    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ConfusingTernary", "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
186        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
187    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
188            throws JsonDecodeException, IOException {
189        var vmName = event.vmDefinition().getMetadata().getName();
190        if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED) {
191            vmInfos.remove(vmName);
192            vmChannels.remove(vmName);
193            for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
194                for (String conletId : entry.getValue()) {
195                    entry.getKey().respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
196                        conletId, "removeVm", vmName));
197                }
198            }
199        } else {
200            var vmDef = new K8sDynamicModel(channel.client().getJSON()
201                .getGson(), convertQuantities(event.vmDefinition().data()));
202            vmInfos.put(vmName, vmDef);
203            vmChannels.put(vmName, channel);
204            var def = JsonBeanDecoder.create(vmDef.data().toString())
205                .readObject();
206            for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
207                for (String conletId : entry.getValue()) {
208                    entry.getKey().respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
209                        conletId, "updateVm", def));
210                }
211            }
212        }
213
214        var summary = evaluateSummary(true);
215        summarySeries.add(Instant.now(), summary.usedCpus, summary.usedRam);
216        for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
217            for (String conletId : entry.getValue()) {
218                entry.getKey().respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
219                    conletId, "updateSummary", summary));
220            }
221        }
222    }
223
224    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals")
225    private JsonObject convertQuantities(JsonObject vmDef) {
226        // Clone and remove managed fields
227        var json = vmDef.deepCopy();
228        GsonPtr.to(json).to("metadata").get(JsonObject.class)
229            .remove("managedFields");
230
231        // Convert RAM sizes to unitless numbers
232        var vmSpec = GsonPtr.to(json).to("spec", "vm");
233        vmSpec.set("maximumRam", Quantity.fromString(
234            vmSpec.getAsString("maximumRam").orElse("0")).getNumber()
235            .toBigInteger());
236        vmSpec.set("currentRam", Quantity.fromString(
237            vmSpec.getAsString("currentRam").orElse("0")).getNumber()
238            .toBigInteger());
239        var status = GsonPtr.to(json).to("status");
240        status.set("ram", Quantity.fromString(
241            status.getAsString("ram").orElse("0")).getNumber()
242            .toBigInteger());
243        return json;
244    }
245
246    /**
247     * Handle the periodic update event by sending {@link NotifyConletView}
248     * events.
249     *
250     * @param event the event
251     * @param connection the console connection
252     */
253    @Handler
254    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
255    public void onUpdate(Update event, ConsoleConnection connection) {
256        var summary = evaluateSummary(false);
257        summarySeries.add(Instant.now(), summary.usedCpus, summary.usedRam);
258        for (String conletId : conletIds(connection)) {
259            connection.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
260                conletId, "updateSummary", summary));
261        }
262    }
263
264    /**
265     * The Class Summary.
266     */
267    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
268    public static class Summary {
269
270        /** The total vms. */
271        public int totalVms;
272
273        /** The running vms. */
274        public int runningVms;
275
276        /** The used cpus. */
277        public int usedCpus;
278
279        /** The used ram. */
280        public BigInteger usedRam = BigInteger.ZERO;
281
282        /**
283         * Gets the total vms.
284         *
285         * @return the totalVms
286         */
287        public int getTotalVms() {
288            return totalVms;
289        }
290
291        /**
292         * Gets the running vms.
293         *
294         * @return the runningVms
295         */
296        public int getRunningVms() {
297            return runningVms;
298        }
299
300        /**
301         * Gets the used cpus.
302         *
303         * @return the usedCpus
304         */
305        public int getUsedCpus() {
306            return usedCpus;
307        }
308
309        /**
310         * Gets the used ram. Returned as String for Json rendering.
311         *
312         * @return the usedRam
313         */
314        public String getUsedRam() {
315            return usedRam.toString();
316        }
317
318    }
319
320    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition")
321    private Summary evaluateSummary(boolean force) {
322        if (!force && cachedSummary != null) {
323            return cachedSummary;
324        }
325        Summary summary = new Summary();
326        for (var vmDef : vmInfos.values()) {
327            summary.totalVms += 1;
328            var status = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.data()).to("status");
329            summary.usedCpus += status.getAsInt("cpus").orElse(0);
330            summary.usedRam = summary.usedRam.add(status.getAsString("ram")
331                .map(BigInteger::new).orElse(BigInteger.ZERO));
332            for (var c : status.getAsListOf(JsonObject.class, "conditions")) {
333                if ("Running".equals(GsonPtr.to(c).getAsString("type")
334                    .orElse(null))
335                    && "True".equals(GsonPtr.to(c).getAsString("status")
336                        .orElse(null))) {
337                    summary.runningVms += 1;
338                }
339            }
340        }
341        cachedSummary = summary;
342        return summary;
343    }
344
345    @Override
346    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDecimalLiteralsInBigDecimalConstructor")
347    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
348            ConsoleConnection channel, VmsModel conletState)
349            throws Exception {
350        event.stop();
351        var vmName = event.params().asString(0);
352        var vmChannel = vmChannels.get(vmName);
353        if (vmChannel == null) {
354            return;
355        }
356        switch (event.method()) {
357        case "start":
358            fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Running", vmChannel));
359            break;
360        case "stop":
361            fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Stopped", vmChannel));
362            break;
363        case "cpus":
364            fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "currentCpus",
365                new BigDecimal(event.params().asDouble(1)).toBigInteger(),
366                vmChannel));
367            break;
368        case "ram":
369            fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "currentRam",
370                new Quantity(new BigDecimal(event.params().asDouble(1)),
371                    Format.BINARY_SI).toSuffixedString(),
372                vmChannel));
373            break;
374        default:// ignore
375            break;
376        }
377    }
378
379    @Override
380    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleConnection channel,
381            String conletId) throws Exception {
382        return true;
383    }
384
385    /**
386     * The Class VmsModel.
387     */
388    public class VmsModel extends ConletBaseModel {
389
390        /**
391         * Instantiates a new vms model.
392         *
393         * @param conletId the conlet id
394         */
395        public VmsModel(String conletId) {
396            super(conletId);
397        }
398
399    }
400}
